reason: Semantic check executed in degraded mode (no ANTHROPIC_API_KEY available). Based on the written spec, the feature goals, constraints (no remote model fetch), and acceptance/verification are sufficiently explicit to proceed.

evidence.citation: Make `eve configure` fully capable of configuring LLM providers and model aliases so that: ... Model alias resolution ... never breaks ... Model selection never depends on a provider implementing a remote "list models" API.

In scope for this feature: ... Provider CRUD in `eve.json.providers` ... Configure model aliases in `eve.json.models` ... Select provider + model via presets OR manual model ID input ... Auto-link ...

evidence.claim: No implicit dependencies or hidden assumptions
evidence.citation: Contract: The wizard must never require fetching a remote model list. Presets are a convenience only. Every provider must offer manual model ID input.

evidence.claim: Edge cases and error paths addressed
evidence.citation: Error Messages + Validation Rules specify: invalid URL, provider exists, missing API key, provider not found, alias exists, model ID non-empty with no remote verification.
Configuration operations are local file reads/writes only; no DB migrations required. Removing a provider is supported via provider removal flow; credentials removal is optional.
